POSTCARD(6D)                                       POSTCARD(6D)





NAME
       postcard - make an image look like a postcard

SYNOPSIS
       postcard inimage outimage

DESCRIPTION
       postcard  creates  a  postcard  image  by adding a black
       frame to the input image and placing  this  on  a  white
       rectangle  that  has  the  exact  same aspect ratio as a
       standard postcard.



IRIX 6.5                  May 5, 2004              POSTCARD(6D)
